Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.arangodb.Consumer
    Use Consumer instead.
    com.arangodb.Predicate
    Use Predicate instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.arangodb.entity.arangosearch.AnalyzerEntity
    use typed analyzers com.arangodb.entity.arangosearch.analyzer
    com.arangodb.internal.cursor.ArangoFilterIterable
    com.arangodb.internal.cursor.ArangoMappingIterable
    com.arangodb.model.HashIndexOptions
    use PersistentIndexOptions instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a hash index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.entity.MinReplicationFactor
    use CollectionCreateOptions.writeConcern(Integer) instead
    com.arangodb.entity.PathEntity
    com.arangodb.model.SkiplistIndexOptions
    use PersistentIndexOptions instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a skiplist index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.entity.TraversalEntity
    com.arangodb.model.TraversalOptions
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    com.arangodb.entity.DocumentField.Type
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    com.arangodb.entity.DocumentField
    Use Id, Key, Rev, From or To instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.allMatch(Predicate<? super T>)
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.allMatch(java.util.function.Predicate) instead.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.annotationFieldFilter(Class<A>, VPackAnnotationFieldFilter<A>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.annotationFieldFilter(Class<A>, VPackAnnotationFieldFilter<A>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.annotationFieldNaming(Class<A>, VPackAnnotationFieldNaming<A>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.annotationFieldNaming(Class<A>, VPackAnnotationFieldNaming<A>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.anyMatch(Predicate<? super T>)
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.anyMatch(java.util.function.Predicate) instead.
    com.arangodb.model.OptionsBuilder.build(HashIndexOptions, Iterable<String>)
    use OptionsBuilder.build(PersistentIndexOptions, Iterable) instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a hash index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.model.OptionsBuilder.build(SkiplistIndexOptions, Iterable<String>)
    use OptionsBuilder.build(PersistentIndexOptions, Iterable) instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a skiplist index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.collectInto(R)
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.collect(java.util.function.Supplier<R>, java.util.function.BiConsumer<R, ? super T>, java.util.function.BiConsumer<R, R>) instead.
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.count()
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.count() instead.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDatabaseAsync.createAnalyzer(AnalyzerEntity)
    use this#createSearchAnalyzer(SearchAnalyzer)}
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.createAnalyzer(AnalyzerEntity)
    use this#createSearchAnalyzer(SearchAnalyzer)}
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.createDatabase(String)
    Use ArangoDBAsync.createDatabase(DbName) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.createDatabase(String)
    Use ArangoDB.createDatabase(DbName) instead
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.db(String)
    Use ArangoDBAsync.db(DbName) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.db(String)
    Use ArangoDB.db(DbName) instead
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDatabaseAsync.deleteAnalyzer(String)
    use this#deleteSearchAnalyzer(String)}}
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.deleteAnalyzer(String)
    use this#deleteSearchAnalyzer(String)}}
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDatabaseAsync.deleteAnalyzer(String, AnalyzerDeleteOptions)
    use this#deleteSearchAnalyzer(String, AnalyzerDeleteOptions)}}
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.deleteAnalyzer(String, AnalyzerDeleteOptions)
    use this#deleteSearchAnalyzer(String, AnalyzerDeleteOptions)}}
    com.arangodb.async.internal.ArangoCollectionAsyncImpl.ensureHashIndex(Iterable<String>, HashIndexOptions)
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoCollectionAsync.ensureHashIndex(Iterable<String>, HashIndexOptions)
    use ArangoCollectionAsync.ensurePersistentIndex(Iterable, PersistentIndexOptions) instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a hash index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.ensureHashIndex(Iterable<String>, HashIndexOptions)
    use ArangoCollection.ensurePersistentIndex(Iterable, PersistentIndexOptions) instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a hash index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.async.internal.ArangoCollectionAsyncImpl.ensureSkiplistIndex(Iterable<String>, SkiplistIndexOptions)
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoCollectionAsync.ensureSkiplistIndex(Iterable<String>, SkiplistIndexOptions)
    use ArangoCollectionAsync.ensurePersistentIndex(Iterable, PersistentIndexOptions) instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a skiplist index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.ensureSkiplistIndex(Iterable<String>, SkiplistIndexOptions)
    use ArangoCollection.ensurePersistentIndex(Iterable, PersistentIndexOptions) instead. Since ArangoDB 3.7 a skiplist index is an alias for a persistent index.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDatabaseAsync.executeTraversal(Class<V>, Class<E>, TraversalOptions)
    use this#query(String, Map, AqlQueryOptions, Class)
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.executeTraversal(Class<V>, Class<E>, TraversalOptions)
    use this#query(String, Map, AqlQueryOptions, Class)
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.filter(Predicate<? super T>)
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.filter(java.util.function.Predicate) instead.
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.first()
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.findFirst() instead.
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.foreach(Consumer<? super T>)
    Use Iterable.forEach(java.util.function.Consumer) instead.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDatabaseAsync.getAnalyzer(String)
    use this#getSearchAnalyzer(String)}
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.getAnalyzer(String)
    use this#getSearchAnalyzer(String)}
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDatabaseAsync.getAnalyzers()
    use this#getSearchAnalyzers()
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.getAnalyzers()
    use this#getSearchAnalyzers()
    com.arangodb.velocystream.Request.getDatabase()
    Use Request.getDbName() instead
    com.arangodb.entity.CollectionEntity.getId()
    Accessing collections by their internal ID instead of accessing them by name is deprecated and highly discouraged. This functionality may be removed in future versions of ArangoDB.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.getLogs(LogOptions)
    use ArangoDBAsync.getLogEntries(LogOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.getLogs(LogOptions)
    use ArangoDB.getLogEntries(LogOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.entity.GraphEntity.getMinReplicationFactor()
    use GraphEntity.getWriteConcern() instead
    com.arangodb.entity.CollectionPropertiesEntity.getMinReplicationFactor()
    use CollectionPropertiesEntity.getWriteConcern() instead
    com.arangodb.model.GraphCreateOptions.getMinReplicationFactor()
    use GraphCreateOptions.getWriteConcern() instead
    com.arangodb.model.GraphCreateOptions.SmartOptions.getMinReplicationFactor()
    use {GraphCreateOptions.SmartOptions.getWriteConcern()} instead
    com.arangodb.model.CollectionCreateOptions.getMinReplicationFactor()
    use CollectionCreateOptions.getWriteConcern() instead
    com.arangodb.entity.arangosearch.analyzer.StopwordsAnalyzerProperties.getStopwords()
    use StopwordsAnalyzerProperties.getStopwordsAsHexList() instead
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoCollectionAsync.load()
    MMFiles only
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.load()
    MMFiles only
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.map(Function<? super T, ? extends R>)
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.map(java.util.function.Function) instead.
    com.arangodb.model.GraphCreateOptions.minReplicationFactor(Integer)
    use GraphCreateOptions.writeConcern(Integer) instead
    com.arangodb.model.CollectionCreateOptions.minReplicationFactor(Integer)
    use CollectionCreateOptions.writeConcern(Integer) instead
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDatabaseAsync.name()
    Use ArangoDatabaseAsync.dbName() instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.name()
    Use ArangoDatabase.dbName() instead
    com.arangodb.model.DBCreateOptions.name(String)
    Use DBCreateOptions.name(DbName) instead.
    com.arangodb.ArangoIterable.noneMatch(Predicate<? super T>)
    Use ArangoIterable.stream() and Stream.noneMatch(java.util.function.Predicate) instead.
    com.arangodb.model.DocumentCreateOptions.overwrite(Boolean)
    use DocumentCreateOptions.overwriteMode(OverwriteMode) instead
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerDeserializer(Class<T>, VPackDeserializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerDeserializer(Class<T>, VPackDeserializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerEnclosingSerializer(Class<T>, VPackSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerEnclosingSerializer(Class<T>, VPackSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerInstanceCreator(Class<T>, VPackInstanceCreator<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerInstanceCreator(Class<T>, VPackInstanceCreator<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerJsonDeserializer(String, ValueType, VPackJsonDeserializer)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerJsonDeserializer(String, ValueType, VPackJsonDeserializer)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerJsonDeserializer(ValueType, VPackJsonDeserializer)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerJsonDeserializer(ValueType, VPackJsonDeserializer)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerJsonModule(VPackParserModule)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerJsonModule(VPackParserModule)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerJsonModules(VPackParserModule...)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerJsonModules(VPackParserModule...)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerJsonSerializer(Class<T>, VPackJsonSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerJsonSerializer(Class<T>, VPackJsonSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerJsonSerializer(String, Class<T>, VPackJsonSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerJsonSerializer(String, Class<T>, VPackJsonSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerModule(VPackModule)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerModule(VPackModule)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerModules(VPackModule...)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerModules(VPackModule...)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom modules.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.registerSerializer(Class<T>, VPackSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.registerSerializer(Class<T>, VPackSerializer<T>)
    Use ArangoJack instead and register custom serializers and deserializers by implementing JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.setDeserializer(ArangoDeserializer)
    use ArangoDBAsync.Builder.serializer(ArangoSerialization) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.setDeserializer(ArangoDeserializer)
    use ArangoDB.Builder.serializer(ArangoSerialization) instead
    com.arangodb.entity.CollectionPropertiesEntity.setMinReplicationFactor(Integer)
    use CollectionPropertiesEntity.setWriteConcern(Integer) instead
    com.arangodb.model.GraphCreateOptions.SmartOptions.setMinReplicationFactor(Integer)
    use {GraphCreateOptions.SmartOptions.setWriteConcern(Integer)} instead
    com.arangodb.model.CollectionCreateOptions.setSchema(CollectionSchema)
    Use CollectionCreateOptions.schema(CollectionSchema) instead.
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoDBAsync.Builder.setSerializer(ArangoSerializer)
    use ArangoDBAsync.Builder.serializer(ArangoSerialization) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.setSerializer(ArangoSerializer)
    use ArangoDB.Builder.serializer(ArangoSerialization) instead
    com.arangodb.async.ArangoCollectionAsync.unload()
    MMFiles only
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.unload()
    MMFiles only
